Name: Cube Farmer
About the game: Embark on this memorable experience with a great and relaxing soundtrack and a beautiful view that will get you extremely satisfied. You are responsible for irrigating the plantation on the islands. To do that, put the water cubes correctly in the indicated position to make the crops grow healthily. - 40 levels; - Original soundtrack; - Satisfactory puzzles; - Low poly; - Play with mouse;
